entertainment.title: Will Smith says 'Star Wars' was better than sex
entertainment.author: By Lisa Respers France, CNN
entertainment.content: It was the early days of special effects, Smith said, and fans were "just completely blown away.""For my entire life I've been chasing, trying to give that feeling to fans," the actor said. "There was nothing that I had experienced in my life that matched that point of ecstasy."Really, Will Smith? Nothing?Apparently not."I had sex a few years later," Smith deadpanned. "It was close, but no 'Star Wars.'""Bright" reunites Smith with "Suicide Squad" director David Ayer.The film stars Smith as a human police officer who must team up with an Orc cop played by Joel Edgerton to fight crime in an alternate reality where Los Angeles is populated by magical creatures."Bright" is scheduled to be released in December.
